name: C-Scale Software
description: C-Scale Software is a nearshore outsourcing company based in the Romanian university town of Craiova. The company was founded by a small team of experts in the domains of embedded systems and networking, who for more than 10 years have been offering embedded applications for various industries and businesses across the world. Our team can handle with success the entire software development process: planning, design, implementation, testing and documentation, deployment and maintenance.
